page.title: 17Agriculture Grant Scheme
page.content: There are two types of grants offered to the farmer. Investment and Development Grants. Listed are some items on which grants may be paid. Facilities for the supply or storage of water for agricultural purposes Field drainage. Roads, paths, grids, Pens, dips and other facilities designed or intended to use in connection with feeding or provide shelter for livestock. Hedges walls and gates Re seeding of grassland Clearance and reclamation of land Provision, replacement or improvement of permanent buildings e.g. bulk dry stores or silos used soley for drying or storage of grain. There are others, but these are the ones most likely to be claimed by the areas in our block
